parameter.name: message
parameter.description: The main body of the post

parameter.name: link
parameter.description: The URL of a link to attach to the post

parameter.name: picture

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Post name (can only be used if link is specified)

parameter.description: Post caption (can only be used if link is specified)
